JobFullDesc: Come be a part of a team of designers, engineers and artists passionate about creating compelling products for Facebook's billions of users. As a Product Designer for the Assistant Design Team, you will be involved in every aspect of the product development process from brainstorming to tweaking pixels and content right before launch.You will be expected to utilize your full range of product design, systems design, interaction design, and visual design skills, and you will own the experience for a wide area of the Assistant product. You will build upon your existing skill-set and passion for multi-modal interaction and systems problem solving, and help define the next generation of multimodal conversational experiences for our Facebook family of apps, as well as our emerging AR and VR products.We are looking for an experienced and talented Product Designer to conceptualize, illustrate, build and deliver innovative conversational systems, tools, and products. You will be expected to drive these experiences from concepts and storyboards to product launch with attention to detail through elegant probabilistic designs that allow humans to interact more naturally with our devices.
